title: Why does Pixel 5 not find the lastest security patch when checking for updates?
content:
I have been trying for days now to apply the latest Feburary security patch on my Pixel 5 which I have bought in January 2021.

I'm trying to check for updates via Settings > System > Advanced > System update

Then the phone keeps on "Checking for updates..." forever, it will not terminate until I actively go back or the display turns off after timeout. If I do so, and open the System update again, it tells me that the last successful check for updates was just now and system is up-to-date.
But this is obviously wrong, since it shows security patch level from 5th December 2020.

I already contacted Google support. They suggest a factory reset, which I really want to avoid since it will take me many hours to set up everything again.

Are there any suggestion, what I can do?

I attached also two screenshots (Sorry, they are in German).

Checking for updates FOREVER (until user interaction / timeout):

Screen after opening the System update again (last check only minutes ago):


Thank you!
